alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Montgomery; Moore; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 4:32PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Moore, eastern Montgomery, southeastern Randolph and southwestern Chatham Counties through 500 PM EST... At 432 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Seagrove to Biscoe to 10 miles southeast of Troy. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Carolina Zoo, Biscoe, Seagrove, Robbins, Star, Candor, Steeds, Harpers Crossroads, Highfalls and Coleridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
